name: War of my worlds (Multiplayer)
description: They say night time is the best part of the day when we can dream the world to be just the way we like...  But mine is a struggle where I am stuck in a constant battle with myself....  Even though I know it is not real I cannot stop it...   - This is a 2 player Online Multiplayer Game - You can't release bomb in the Real World (Night) - You can only release bomb in Dream World (Day) - You will have a few seconds to secure yourself from the exploding Bomb - Closer you are to the core, more damage you take. - First player to kill the opponent wins the game.
